com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api

Interface IScellApiResolver


  • public interface IScellApiResolver
    SCell Public API dependency container

    Aimed to resolve or replace all needed API instances

    Can be obtained if ScellApiProvider.getApiResolverAsync() was successful

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <TInstance>
      void      		 registerImplementation(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass, Class<? extends TInstance> implementation)
      Binds implementation class to the given interface.
      <TInstance>
      void      		 registerInstance(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass, TInstance instance)
      Binds singleton class instance to the given interface.
      <TInstance>
      TInstance      		 resolve(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass)
      Resolves new instance or singleton instance of given interface.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        <TInstance> TInstance resolve(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass)
        Resolves new instance or singleton instance of given interface. Type of returned instance depends on registration type of given interface.
        Type Parameters:
        TInstance - interface type;
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Class<TInstance> interface to resolve;
        Returns:
        corresponding instance.
        Throws:
        com.google.inject.ConfigurationException - if this resolver cannot find or create the provider.
        com.google.inject.ProvisionException - if there was a runtime failure while providing an instance.
        See Also:
        registerInstance(Class, Object), registerImplementation(Class, Class)

      • registerInstance

        <TInstance> void registerInstance(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass,
                                  TInstance instance)
        Binds singleton class instance to the given interface.

        On resolve(Class) of given interface will always be returned that singleton class instance.

        Type Parameters:
        TInstance - interface type.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Class<TInstance> interface to bind;
        instance - TInstance singleton class instance;

      • registerImplementation

        <TInstance> void registerImplementation(Class<TInstance> interfaceClass,
                                        Class<? extends TInstance> implementation)
        Binds implementation class to the given interface.

        On resolve(Class) of given interface will be returned a new instance of such implementation class.

        Type Parameters:
        TInstance - interface type.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Class<TInstance> interface to bind;
        implementation - Class<? extends TInstance> implementation class;
